name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Our Pins — Link sharing for teams

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ultra quick posting to Our Pins, the live & private, visual, knowledge database tool for creative teams by User Studio.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Our Pins is probably the simplest knowledge database tool for live sharing and saving links privately within teams of designers, developers, creatives… with a visual board approach, a capacity to save images, videos and PDFs, to search and sort by tags. Slack app available.

Created by User Studio members for their own enjoyment, and shared with the World for fame and friendship.
